I used Heretrix to crawl one of the websites that has a lot of dynamic
urls=
. I have read that crawlers typically have problems crawling
dynamic  URLs.=
 I don't find these URL's in Google's index. But
Heretrix has been able to =
crawl these URLs. Because dynamically
generated pages don't actually exist =
until a user selects the
variable(s) that generate them, I am curious to kn=
ow how Heretrix is
able to crawl them.
Example:
http://autos.aol.com/autos_=
compare?v1=3D9210|USB80TOC161C0&v2=3D9287|USB80CHC212C0&v3=3D9736|USB80HOC0=
